animeDescription: The Media Factory mascot character franchise revolves around a male rabbit that transforms into Usaru-san by wearing a monkey costume and eating bananas. The title “Usaru-san” is a portmanteau of “usagi” (rabbit) and “saru” (monkey).  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Baba Toshiko', ['Character Design', 'Key Animation', 'Animation Director']], ['Ooseki Tatsue', ['Color Design']], ['Ikeda Shinsuke', ['Director of Photography']]]
